src:
DIkalahkan Levante, Skuat Barcelona Diminta Introspeksi Diri
03 Nov 2019, 04:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang Barcelona, Sergio Busquets mengaku kecewa dengan kekalahan timnya saat berhadapan dengan Levante dini hari tadi. Busquets menyebut bahwa para pemain Barca harus merefleksikan kesalahan mereka agar kesalahan itu tidak terulang lagi di masa depan.
Pada jornada ke-12 La Liga ini, Barcelona mendapatkan hasil yang mengejutkan. Mereka tumbang di tangan Levante dengan skor telak 3-1.
Kekalahan ini tergolong menyakitkan karena Barca berhasil unggul terlebih dahulu melalui gol Lionel Messi. Namun di babak kedua mereka lengah, sehingga Levante mampu mencetak tiga gol dalam kurun waktu tujuh menit saja.
Busquets percaya bahwa seluruh pemain Barca bertanggung jawab penuh atas kekalahan ini. "Semua pemain harus menganalisis pertandingan ini dan mencoba membenarkan kesalahan masing-masing," buka Busquets yang diwawancarai Marca.

Baca komentar lengkap gelandang veteran itu di bawah ini.
text:
Defeated by Levante, Barcelona's squad asked for self-examination
Nov 3 2019, 04:00 by Bola.net
Barcelona - Barcelona midfielder Sergio Busquets admitted disappointed with the defeat of his team when dealing with Levante early this morning. Busquets said that the Barca players must reflect on their mistakes so that mistakes will not be repeated in the future.
In the 12th season of La Liga, Barcelona got a surprising result. They fell in the hands of Levante with a landslide score of 3-1.
This defeat is quite painful because Barca succeeded in winning first through Lionel Messi's goal. But in the second half they let their guard down, so Levante was able to score three goals in just over seven minutes.
Busquets believes that all Barca players are fully responsible for this defeat. "All players must analyze this match and try to justify each other's mistakes," said Busquets interviewed by Marca.

Read the veteran's midfielder's full comments below.
